work.name: Company Name
work.summary: NF/SG Healthcare for Homeless Veterans Program. Coach, mentor, develop 100 clients with resume assistance, career counseling, complaints, and problems.
highlights: Develop, manage and evaluate training and organizational effectiveness strategies
Develop career plans that fit clients' aptitudes, education levels, physical abilities, and career goals.
Serve as internal consultant to resolve issues such as: employee retention, skill development, professional growth, succession planning, and performance improvement.
Evaluate, motivate, coach, and counsel 25 peers in the performance of their duties.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Participated in group orientation for clients to promote the development of entry-level and career job opportunities.
highlights: Administered career scope assessment tests for 100 clients to identify skill building needs.
Attended meetings to obtain information for use in training programs
